verses.verse: The <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3789>written<s%> with a <S%H5842>pen<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and with the <S%H6856>point<s%> of a <S%H8068>diamond<s%>: it is <S%H2790>graven<s%> upon the <S%H3871>table<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of your <S%H4196>altars<s%>;

Whilst their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%> and their <S%H842>groves<s%> by the <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> upon the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%>.

O my <S%H2042>mountain<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thy <S%H2428>substance<s%> and all thy <S%H214>treasures<s%> to the <S%H957>spoil<s%>, and thy high <S%H1116>places<s%> for <S%H2403>sin<s%>, throughout all thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>.

And thou, even thyself, shalt <S%H8058>discontinue<s%> from thine <S%H5159>heritage<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> thee; and I will cause thee to <S%H5647>serve<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not: for ye have <S%H6919>kindled<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, which shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

¶ Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in <S%H120>man<s%>, and <S%H7760>maketh<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> his <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5493>departeth<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

For he shall be like the <S%H6199>heath<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert<s%>, and shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> when <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>; but shall <S%H7931>inhabit<s%> the parched <S%H2788>places<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in a <S%H4420>salt<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and not <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and whose <S%H4009>hope<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is.

For he shall be as a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and that spreadeth <S%H7971>out<s%> her <S%H8328>roots<s%> by the <S%H3105>river<s%>, and shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> when <S%H2527>heat<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, but her <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall be <S%H7488>green<s%>; and shall not be <S%H1672>careful<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1226>drought<s%>, neither shall <S%H4185>cease<s%> from <S%H6213>yielding<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%>.
¶ The <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H6121>deceitful<s%> above all things, and desperately <S%H605>wicked<s%>: who can <S%H3045>know<s%> it?

I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2713>search<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%>, I <S%H974>try<s%> the <S%H3629>reins<s%>, even to <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

As the <S%H7124>partridge<s%> <S%H1716>sitteth<s%> on eggs, and <S%H3205>hatcheth<s%> them not; so he that <S%H6213>getteth<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and not by <S%H4941>right<s%>, shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of his <S%H3117>days<s%>, and at his <S%H319>end<s%> shall be a <S%H5036>fool<s%>.
¶ A <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> from the <S%H7223>beginning<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of our <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H4723>hope<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thee shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, and they that <S%H3249>depart<s%> from <S%H5493>me<s%> shall be <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
<S%H7495>Heal<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and I shall be <S%H7495>healed<s%>; <S%H3467>save<s%> me, and I shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>: for thou art my <S%H8416>praise<s%>.
¶ Behold, they <S%H559>say<s%> unto me, Where is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? let it <S%H935>come<s%> now.

As for me, I have not <S%H213>hastened<s%> from being a <S%H7462>pastor<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> thee: neither have I <S%H183>desired<s%> the <S%H605>woeful<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>: that which came <S%H4161>out<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> was right <S%H5227>before<s%> <S%H6440>thee<s%>.
Be not a <S%H4288>terror<s%> unto me: thou art my <S%H4268>hope<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me, but let not me be <S%H954>confounded<s%>: let them be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>, but let not me be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>: <S%H935>bring<s%> upon them the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H7665>destroy<s%> them with <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H7670>destruction<s%>.

¶ Thus <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto me; <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, whereby the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%>, and by the which they go <S%H3318>out<s%>, and in all the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, ye <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that enter <S%H935>in<s%> by these <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H5315>yourselves<s%>, and <S%H5375>bear<s%> no <S%H4853>burden<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, nor <S%H935>bring<s%> it in by the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;

Neither carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%> out of your <S%H1004>houses<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, neither <S%H6213>do<s%> ye any <S%H4399>work<s%>, but <S%H6942>hallow<s%> ye the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

But they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not, neither <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%>, but made their <S%H6203>neck<s%> <S%H7185>stiff<s%>, that they might not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, nor <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if ye <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> in no <S%H4853>burden<s%> through the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, but <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein;

Then shall there <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H7392>riding<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and on <S%H5483>horses<s%>, they, and their <S%H8269>princes<s%>, the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and from the places <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and from the <S%H8219>plain<s%>, and from the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and from the <S%H5045>south<s%>, <S%H935>bringing<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and meat <S%H4503>offerings<s%>, and <S%H3828>incense<s%>, and <S%H935>bringing<s%> sacrifices of <S%H8426>praise<s%>, unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

But if ye will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me to <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and not to <S%H5375>bear<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%>, even entering <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; then will I <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>.
